events.message: I ordered a jacket two weeks ago and it arrived damaged. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer reported a damaged product and requested a refund. Case assigned to Refund cluster.
Customer support agent assigned to handle the refund request for the damaged jacket.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the damaged jacket you received. I’m here to help with the refund process.
Could you please provide photos of the damage and your order number so we can proceed with the refund?
I have attached photos of the jacket’s tear right on the sleeve, along with my order number #123456789.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and send a confirmation once completed.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate you handling this promptly and look forward to receiving the refund.
Your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited to your original payment method shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was successfully received and no further assistance was requested, we are closing this case.
